  1. Time Series
  2. Growth and Attrition

Measuring and Visualizing Growth and Attrition

Measuring Retention over Time

Grids and Rates generates a series of retention grids, uses the grids to extract n-month retention rates, and visualizes retention over time between cohort groups.

Visualizing the Balance between Growth Attrition Over Time

Layer Cakes generates a series of specialized stacked area charts, using “Layer Cakes” (courtesy ThinkInsights.net) to visualize inflow and total cohort membership over time.

Visualizing Growth and Attrition Using Networks and Alluvial Diagrams

Networks and Alluvials makes use of network and alluvial layouts to examine the flow of cohort members between different groups over time.
